abstract: The Association of Music Producers, New York, presented its first awards for music and sound. The Best of Show award was won by “Metamorphosis,” an animated short for Good Books, with music by Antfood, New York.
snippet: The Association of Music Producers, New York, presented its first awards for music and sound. The Best of Show award was won by “Metamorphosis,” an animated short for Good Books, with music by Antfood, New York.
lead_paragraph: The Association of Music Producers, New York, presented its first AMP Awards for Music and Sound. The Best of Show award was won by “Metamorphosis,” an animated short for Good Books, an online bookseller, with music by Antfood, New York. “Metamorphosis” also shared the award for best use of music/sound for Web or interactive branding with Yessian, for “Compilation,” for “Dream Bigger Dreams” by Nick Cave. The association also announced the inaugural inductions into the Association of Music Producers Hall of Fame, the Coca-Cola Company and the McDonald’s Corporation.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
